conclusion: The yellow stream from A seems to be deflected towards the center by the gray bar, possibly allowing some of it to reach container E as well.

Meanwhile, the blue stream from B is flowing straight down and seems to be heading towards container E, while the yellow stream from C is also flowing down and might be splitting between containers D and E.
Maybe the liquid from A will go mostly into container D, while the liquid from B and C will go into container E.
